sentences.en: " It's a swell suite, " whispered Jordan respectfully, and every one laughed.
sentences.cn: “ 这个套间真高级. ” 乔丹肃然起敬地低声说, 引得大家都笑了起来.

sentences.en: a suite of rooms for palace guests
Come to my suite so I can tell you all about this wonderful play I saw in Boston.
sentences.cn: 到我的套房来吧，这样我就可以跟你好好讲讲我在波士顿看的这部非常棒的戏了。

sentences.en: He invited me to his suite. The luxury takes your breath away.
sentences.cn: 他请我到他的套房里去, 那豪华的气派真会令你吃惊.

sentences.en: I suggest we fit you up with an office suite.
sentences.cn: 我建议我们给你配备一间办公套房。

sentences.en: It's £65 for a single, £98 for a double and £120 for an entire suite.
sentences.cn: 单人间65英镑,双人间98英镑,套房120英镑.

sentences.en: Malone got to his feet and followed his superior out of the suite.
sentences.cn: 马隆站起身来，跟在他的上司后面走出了套房。

sentences.en: Morris executed a suite of twelve drawings in 1978.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯在1978年创作了由12幅画组成的一组作品。

sentences.en: She gave Madeline a tough unpleasant sad glance, and left the suite.
sentences.cn: 她用粗暴、不快和忧郁的神色瞥了梅德琳一眼, 就走了.

sentences.en: She has a suite of rooms in the hotel.
sentences.cn: 她在那家旅馆有一套房间.

sentences.en: That is a nice suite of furniture.
The bridal suite was prepared for the reception of the honeymooners.
sentences.cn: 新婚套间已准备好以接待度蜜月的人.

sentences.en: The manager himself ushered Jill to an enormous penthouse suite.
sentences.cn: 经理亲自陪吉尔走进一套宽敞的楼顶套间.

sentences.en: The master bedroom has its own en suite bathroom.
sentences.cn: 主卧室带有独立卫生间。

sentences.en: They dined in a special suite in glorious splendour.
sentences.cn: 他们在一间富丽堂皇的套房里进餐.

sentences.en: They had a fabulous time during their week in a suite at the Paris Hilton.
sentences.cn: 他们在巴黎希尔顿酒店的套房里度过了非常愉快的一周。

words.tran_cn: （一套）家具；套房；组曲；（一批）[劳经]随员，随从

trans.tran_cn: [计]（软件的）套件，（房间，器具等）一套，一副，[乐]组曲，随从
trans.tran_en: a set of rooms, especially expensive ones in a hotel
